8 bit.gadget: Both pretty good. Cheat cartridge 90% of time, Extra Credits in heist.
8 bit.starpower: Boosted booster 99% of time. Speed vs snipers and counters some times.

amber.gadget: Both good. Fire starter better if you pick one due to star power synergy. Dancing flames is anti aggro + play around walls

angelo.gadget: Stinging Flight 99% of time. Master Fletcher still good in certain matchups+maps

barley.gadget: Two good gadgets. Herbal tonic generally better, but sticky good vs assassins.
barley.starpower: Damage star power. Healing good if you are facing throwers
barley.gear: Any two of damage, gadget, and shield.

bea.starpower: Honeycomb more powerful. Insta Beaload if you're not confident in your aim.

belle.gadget: Nest egg most of the time. Reverse polarity ok on some maps.

bibi.starpower: Home run 99% of time. Batting stance sometimes on grassy maps + vs tanks.
bibi.gear: Speed and damage. Swap speed for shield/health if not grassy.

bo.gadget: Super totem 99% of time. Tripwire good in brawl ball + to break open map.
bo.gear: Reload and damage. Vision okay in super grassy maps

brock.gadget: Rocket fuel 99% of time. Rocket laces okay vs aggro.
brock.gear: Reload and shield. Damage instead of shield in heist.

bull.gadget: Stomper. T-bone injector okay in heist.
bull.gear: Damage and super charge. Speed over super charge on grassy maps.

buzz.starpower: Eyes Sharp. Other one okay vs tanks

byron.gadget: Shot in the arm better vs sharpshooters. Booster shot better vs aggro.
byron.gear: Shield and gadget. Damage instead if you don't take shot in the arm.

charlie.gadget: Spiders. Other gadget if vs aoe like sandy/emz/etc.

chester.gadget: Candy beans. Other is fine but both gadgets are mid
chester.gear: Speed and damage. Vision good in super grassy maps which chester is often good in.

chuck.gadget: Rerouting. Allows you to get final post in easier. Super up, reroute, place on safe.
chuck.gear: Damage and shield. Gadget if you are using ghost train. Can swap health for shield in non-heist

collette.starpower: Mass tax in heist. Both good elsewhere

colt.gadget: Speedloader. Silver bullet good vs walls/throwers.

crow.gadget: Both gadgets underwhelming. Slow slightly better.
crow.starpower: Extra toxic. Carrion crow is fine too.
crow.gear: Mythic and shield. Can sub out mythic for whatever

darryl.gadget: Both are just okay. Slight preference for recoiling rotator

draco.starpower: Shredding better on long range maps. Expose better vs tanks
draco.gear: Probably gadget and health/damage. Need time to fully test.
draco.tips: Pairs great with Kit, Byron when supering. Great for when pressure is needed (hot zone, etc.)

edgar.starpower: Hard landing vs squishy. Fisticuffs vs tanks

el primo.gadget: Suplex suplement to enhance ability to counter bibi, buzz, etc. Asteroid belt okay on some maps or vs throwers.

fang.gadget: Both good. Corn-fu to stop healing + control. Roundhouse to confirm kills.

gene.gadget: Vengeful vs long range. Lamp blowout brawl ball or vs tanks
gene.starpower: Magic puffs a little better. Spirit slap good with hyper

gray.starpower: Fake Injury on ko/bounty. New perspective elsewhere

griff.tips: Midrange wallbreaker. Use on any map you need a wallbreak + midrange on

grom.gadget: radio check. Watchtower can be useful

jacky.gear: Speed and damage. Super charge and gadget can be swapped in just as good.

jessie.gadget: Spark plug. Recoil Spring in heist
jessie.gear: Damage and pet power in heist. Speed > pet power otherwise.

kit.gadget: Cardboard box. Cheeseburger okay too now.

leon.gadget: Lollipop drop. Allows you to connect bushes and push up control. Team invis is super strong.
leon.starpower: Invisiheal. Smoke trails okay on long range maps
leon.gear: Mythic and damage. Shield and damage is safer build.

max.starpower: Run and Gun. Super charged in knockout/bounty and quickfire.

meg.gadget: Jolting Volts to pressure enemy back. Toolbox good vs gene

mico.gadget: Clipping screen 99% of time. Presto okay in niche scenarios.
mico.starpower: Monkey business. Record smash in heist.

mortis.starpower: Both good. Coiled snake better high elo.

nani.gadget: Return to Sender in bounty/knockout/vs snipers. Teleport in heist/brawl ball/gem grab.
nani.starpower: Autofocus in bounty/knockout. tempered steel other modes

nita.gadget: Faux Fur. Bear paws good vs tanks and in brawl ball
nita.starpower: Bear with me. Hyper bear in heist
nita.gear: Damage and speed. Pet power in heist.

otis.gear: Speed and vision in grassy. Damage and super charge elsewhere.

pearl.starpower: Heat shield. Heat retention okay vs aggro

penny.starpower: Master blaster/heavy coffers equal. Blaster better vs aggro

piper.gadget: Auto aimer vs aggro/as default. Homemade recipe if no aggro

poco.starpower: Both good. Da capo great heals. Screeching solo if you play aggro.

r t.gadget: Hacks if long range. Out of line vs aggro or on maps like parallel plays/sneaky fields

rt.gadget: Hacks if long range. Out of line vs aggro or on maps like parallel plays/sneaky fields

rico.gadget: Multiball launcher. Bouncy castle okay vs only snipers
rico.starpower: Super bouncy better. Robo retreat okay

ruffs.starpower: Air superiority. Field promotion okay on knockout/bounty

shelly.starpower: Shell shock. Both pretty mid so can go without.

spike.gadget: Life plant. Popping pincushion on heist

stu.gadget: Speedzone usually. Breakthrough on good maps
stu.starpower: Gasoheal. Zero drag vs snipers/long range

surge.gadget: Power shield usually. Power surge for consistency

tick.starpower: Well Oiled. Automa-tick reload if no enemy throwers/threats

willow.gadget: Both meh. Dive better vs aggro. Spellbound for confirming kills

berry.gadget: Friendship is great to counter aggro
berry.tips: Attack is impact + damage zone after. Damage zone doesn't stack. Weak vs tanks
